text: Discovery Kids was a Canadian English language specialty television channel owned by Corus Entertainment and Discovery Kids. It was a Canadian version of the U.S. channel of the same name (now known as Discovery Family), which aired children's programming oriented towards nature, science, and technology subjects. It was aimed at kids aged four to eight. Category:Canadian television channels Category:2001 establishments in Canada Category:2009 disestablishments Category:Toronto
title: Discovery Kids (Canadian TV channel)
